solution_line_template: If the solver got a head in {num_heads} of the {total_flips} flips, he got {total_flips}-{num_heads} =<<{total_flips}-{num_heads}={num_tails}>>{num_tails} tails
The number of tails than he got more than head is {num_tails}-{num_heads}=<<{num_tails}-{num_heads}={more_tails_than_heads}>>{more_tails_than_heads}
